short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension changes the referrer when browsing medium to make it easier to read.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse medium as if you were coming straight from twitter itself. Makes articles easier to read using the twitter formatting.
